channel.title: Adding a spec (like ruby bolt) that uses it randomly on a wep with no arrow (PI)

item.title: Adding a spec (like ruby bolt) that uses it randomly on a wep with no arrow (PI)
item.dc:creator: @Leoiscool Leoiscool
item.description:
@Leoiscool wrote:

ok basicly what i need because i made d bolts too OP, which is quite good, and i need a melee weapon that uses the “spec” or whatever you should call it, like ruby bolts code is:

if (Misc.random(4) == 1 && c.lastArrowUsed == 9242 && damage > 0 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 9185) { Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].gfx0(754); damage = Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP/5; //c.handleHitMask(c.playerLevel[3]/10); c.dealDamage(c.playerLevel[3]/10); c.gfx0(754); }

as you see it says

&& c.lastArrowUsed == 9242 && damage > 0

i tried removing that and adding

if (Misc.random(4) == 1 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4718) {

it did not use its “spec” and i tried
if (Misc.random(4) == 1 && damage > 0 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4718) {
still nothing.

[size=18pt] help me please? thanks[/size]

Read full topic
